txt.en: Vaskorn has asked you to continue his search, beginning at Óinsbridge.

#-1:[placeholder]'Much like the wizard Radagast, we have seen many animals sickened with a mysterious poison. I would swear it must be the work of spiders, and yet - no spiders! Everyone knows they are gone.\n\n'I have just returned from a wearying search for clues, and must rest or fall asleep standing. Would you visit the few locations I was unable to, #-1:{sister[f]|brother}?'
Search for clues along the edge of the lake in Thornholt
Vaskorn can be found in the Beorning dwellings of Skoghús, in Thornholt.\n\nYou should hurry back to Vaskorn and alert him to your findings.
Return to Vaskorn

You begin to tell Vaskorn all you have seen, when he interrupts.\n\n'More poisoned creatures? Poison weapons? Spider-folk? Slow down, you're talking too fast for this Beorning. There is no doubt, you had an eventful expedition!'
You should carry on Vaskorn's search, continuing on to the edge of the lake in Thornholt.
Defeat the attackers at Kêr Bréin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Explore to learn more about the Ungoledain
Search for the wielders of the poison weapons
Search for clues in Óinsbridge
TBD
It appears these creatures were defeated with a deadly poison
The Beorning Vaskorn has scouted much of Thornholt searching for clues to the mysterious poisoning.

'Much like the wizard Radagast, we have seen many animals sickened with a mysterious poison. I would swear it must be the work of spiders, and yet - no spiders! Everyone knows they are gone.\n\n'I have just returned from a wearying search for clues, and must rest or fall asleep standing. Would you visit the few locations I was unable to, [placeholder]?'
These weapons appear to have a poisonous substance on them
You should defeat the attackers at Kêr Bréin, on the north-western outskirts of Thornholt.
Even without the shade of trees, the darkness feels more oppressive here
Traces of Poison
Defeated an attacker at Kêr Bréin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You should carry on Vaskorn's search, continuing on to the outskirts of Thornholt, heading north towards the Steel Keep.
